abstract: In a continuing drive to pick up assets of its troubled rivals, Santander is eyeing acquisitions in the United States and Britain, The Financial Times reported.
snippet: In a continuing drive to pick up assets of its troubled rivals, Santander is eyeing acquisitions in the United States and Britain, The Financial Times reported.
lead_paragraph: In a continuing drive to pick up assets of its troubled rivals, Santander is eyeing acquisitions in the United States and Britain, The Financial Times reported.

headline.main: Santander Poised to Acquire R.B.S. Branches
